name: Letter From Pine Tree Mountain
description:
A short point-and-click adventure game about a dog getting their mail.

Made for friends and family as a Christmas Card, if you don't have a code - you can still play the full game by clicking  "start as guest" on the title screen.

You'll have to extract (unzip) the files, then select Mac or Windows and open the game.
developers: Two Bees in an Escape Pod
